displayProperties.name: Sustenance
displayProperties.description:
Just a small note to remind you all that while I love building _Braytech_, it is my \[only\] source of income and I am currently dependant upon it (and it me).

While others choose an ad-supported model, I've always believed that ads suck and that I'd rather die in a revive restricted zone.

To that end, should you find value in my work, I humbly request your support.
